pools.description: Pools is the list of agent pools to manage.

metricsPort.description: MetricsPort is the port number that serves Prometheus metrics. Default: 9922

daemon.description: Daemon contains settings for the background daemon processes.

CmdCLIConfig.description: CLIConfig is the top-level configuration for the daemon.

reaperInterval.description: ReaperInterval is how often to check for and clean up stale agents. Default: 30s

reconcileInterval.description: ReconcileInterval is how often to reconcile expected vs actual agent count. Default: 5s

DaemonConfig.description: Config contains settings for daemon background processes.

pat.description: PAT is an Azure Devops personal access token used for registering the agents

pool.description: Pool is the pool name for the agent to join

url.description: Url of the server. For example: https://dev.azure.com/myorganization or http://my-azure-devops-server:8080/tfs

projectName.description: ProjectName is the name of the incus project used for Azure Pipelines Agent runners

agentCount.description: AgentCount is the number of agents to run on this node

maxCores.description:
MaxCores specifies the max number of cores that each agent can use. Used to set limits.cpu.allowance
for percentage-based soft limits

maxRamInGb.description: MaxRamInGb specifies the max amount of RAM that each agent can use

tmpfsSizeInGb.description: TmpfsSizeInGb specifies the maximum size of the tmpfs directory mounted to /tmp in each agent container

namePrefix.description: NamePrefix is the prefix used for naming agent containers

image.description: Image is the Incus image alias to use for agent containers

startupGracePeriod.description: StartupGracePeriod is how long to wait before considering an agent stale
